duties_responsibilities.duty: Create the functional vision and lead the design of solutions for specific business problems.
Provide insight and connections between customer's business problems and product suite.
Scope, Design, and Implement solutions using the WMS technology.
Work hands-on with customers to demonstrate and communicate implementation best practices.
Design and implement customer solutions following best practices and ensure knowledge transfer.
Communicate organizational vision to prospective clients and stay updated on evolving technologies for data and analytics.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain, Business, Accounting, Information Systems, or equivalent Supply Chain systems experience.
At least 2 years of experience implementing JDA/Blue Yonder WMS versions 2017 and above at a configuration/functional level.
MOCA and SQL knowledge preferred but not required.
